level.heading: Rules of procedure.
level.text: The Commission shall develop its own rules of procedure, except they shall provide that the Commission shall meet at least every other month.

level.heading: History
level.text: (Oct. 29, 1975, D.C. Law 1-24, title IV, ยง 406, 22 DCR 2461.)

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 1-24
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-24, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 7-501.01.
